page.title: 18EDUCATION:SCHOOL MAGAZINE
page.content: THE{SMILER MAGAZINE}HAS BEEN PRODUCED FOR 3 YEARS SINCE 1982. IT CONSISTS OF WRITING BY THE{CHILDREN OF CHICKERELL {SCHOOL.}THE EDITORS ARE PEOPLE FROM THE TOP CLASS, AGED 11. THE ARTICLES ARE THINGS LIKE{STORIES, JOKES, {RECIPES, POEMS AND WRITING ON {SOMEONE'S EXPERIENCES.}THE{SMILER}HAS 8 DOUBLE PAGES OF WRITING. THERE ARE ALSO THINGS LIKE{ANAGRAMS, CROSSWORDS, {WORDSEARCHES AND MAZES.}IT COMES OUT EACH TERM {SPRING, SUMMER}AND{AUTUMN. ITS COSTS 10p. CHILDREN DESIGN THE COVERS FOR{SMILER. MRS.LEGG,}TYPES IT OUT. THEY ALSO ADVERTISE SCHOOL T-SHIRTS AND SWEAT-SHIRTS IN SMILER, BUT ONLY IN THE SUMMER EDITIONS.IT IS AN EXTREMLEY GOOD SCHOOL MAGAZINE.THE {1985 EDITORS ARE LINDA HONEYBUN, WENDY {CONDELL, DEBORAH ELMES, RUSSEL DEAN, {PAUL HOSKINS AND BRIAN OLDRIDGE.
